description.english: Prepare for the 1st exhibition.
description.schinese: 准备好第一期的画展。
description.tchinese: 準備好第一期的畫展。

description.english: Prepare for the 2nd exhibition.
description.schinese: 准备好第二期的画展。
description.tchinese: 準備好第二期的畫展。

description.english: Prepare for the 3rd exhibition.
description.schinese: 准备好第三期的画展。
description.tchinese: 準備好第三期的畫展。

description.english: Prepare for the 4th exhibition.
description.schinese: 准备好第四期的画展。
description.tchinese: 準備好第四期的畫展。

description.english: Prepare for the 5th exhibition.
description.schinese: 准备好第五期的画展。
description.tchinese: 準備好第五期的畫展。

description.english: Prepare for the 6th exhibition.
description.schinese: 准备好第六期的画展。
description.tchinese: 準備好第六期的畫展。

description.english: Prepare for the seventh exhibition.
description.schinese: 准备好第七期的画展。
description.tchinese: 準備好第七期的畫展。

description.english: Garbage collection day. (1-1)
description.schinese: 垃圾回收日。（1-1）
description.tchinese: 垃圾回收日。（1-1）

description.english: Separate use. (1-2)
description.schinese: 分开使用。（1-2）
description.tchinese: 分開使用。（1-2）

description.english: All thanks to the help of the redditer. (1-3)
description.schinese: 全靠网友们的帮忙。（1-3）
description.tchinese: 全靠網友們的幫忙。（1-3）

description.english: Putting it this way is actually not convenient for viewing. (1-4)
description.schinese: 这样放其实不方便观看。（1-4）
description.tchinese: 這樣放其實不方便觀看。（1-4）

description.english: I prefer a solid color desktop without icons. (1-5)
description.schinese: 我更喜欢无图标的纯色桌面。（1-5）
description.tchinese: 我更喜歡無圖示的純色桌面。（1-5）

description.english: Happy family. (1-6)
description.schinese: 快乐一家人。（1-6）
description.tchinese: 快樂一家人。（1-6）

description.english: No crossing over! (2-1)
description.schinese: 不许越过！（2-1）
description.tchinese: 不許越過！（2-1）

description.english: Watch out for traffic safety. (2-2)
description.schinese: 注意交通安全。（2-2）
description.tchinese: 注意交通安全。（2-2）

description.english: Throw away the extra cable. (2-3)
description.schinese: 多出来的线，就丢掉吧。（2-3）
description.tchinese: 多出來的線，就丟掉吧。（2-3）

description.english: Hesitate for a long time. (2-4)
description.schinese: 犹豫了很久。（2-4）
description.tchinese: 猶豫了很久。（2-4）

description.english: I've been using the basket for a long time. (3-1)
description.schinese: 用了很久的洗菜篮。（3-1）
description.tchinese: 用了很久的洗菜籃。（3-1）

description.english: Smiling at me. (3-2)
description.schinese: 对着我笑。（3-2）
description.tchinese: 對著我笑。（3-2）

description.english: Change the door! (3-3)
description.schinese: 我要换门！（3-3）
description.tchinese: 我要換門！（3-3）

description.english: Heartbeat. (3-4)
description.schinese: 心跳加速。（3-4）
description.tchinese: 心跳加速。（3-4）

description.english: Floating in the universe. (4-1)
description.schinese: 漂浮于宇宙之中。（4-1）
description.tchinese: 漂浮於宇宙之中。（4-1）

displayName.english: Turn off the lights at night

description.english: Cherish the earth. (4-2)
description.schinese: 爱护地球，节约用电。（4-2）
description.tchinese: 愛護地球，節約用電。（4-2）

description.english: Not bad. (4-3)
Fix it! (4-4)
The root of all evil. (4-5)
description.schinese: 万恶之源。（4-5）
description.tchinese: 萬惡之源。（4-5）

description.english: Schedule the dates for taking the red pill and the blue pill. (4-6)
description.schinese: 安排好红色药丸和蓝色药丸的服用日期。（4-6）
description.tchinese: 安排好紅色藥丸和藍色藥丸的服用日期。（4-6）

description.english: Don't push the air, look at me! (5-1)
description.schinese: 别推空气了，看我的！（5-1）
description.tchinese: 別推空氣了，看我的！（5-1）

description.english: Walk on the road and look underground. (5-2)
description.schinese: 走在路上，看着地下。（5-2）
description.tchinese: 走在路上，看著地下。（5-2）

description.english: The most primitive pleasure. (5-3)
description.schinese: 最原始的快乐。（5-3）
description.tchinese: 最原始的快樂。（5-3）

description.english: Parking is too expensive. (5-4)
description.schinese: 停车费太贵了。（5-4）
description.tchinese: 停車費太貴了。（5-4）

description.english: Where would it be better to sit? (5-5)
description.schinese: 坐哪里会比较好？（5-5）
description.tchinese: 坐哪裡會比較好？（5-5）

displayName.english: The Moon and her Star Pals

description.english: The moon and the stars are in a line. (5-6)
description.schinese: 月亮和星星连成一条线了。（5-6）
description.tchinese: 月亮和星星連成一條線了。（5-6）

description.english: Only three cuts are needed. (6-1)
description.schinese: 只需要切三刀。（6-1）
description.tchinese: 只需要切三刀。（6-1）

description.english: It's counterproductive. (6-2)
description.schinese: 适得其反。（6-2）
description.tchinese: 適得其反。（6-2）

description.english: Always get lost in thought when taking a bath. (6-3)
description.schinese: 洗澡的时候总会陷入沉思。（6-3）
description.tchinese: 洗澡的時候總會陷入沉思。（6-3）

description.english: The usage rate is 100% of some people even if it is 0.1%. (6-4)
description.schinese: 使用率即时是0.1%，也是某些人的100%。（6-4）
description.tchinese: 使用率即時是0.1%，也是某些人的100%。（6-4）

description.english: Neat and tidy. (6-6)
description.schinese: 整整齐齐。（6-6）
description.tchinese: 整整齊齊。（6-6）

displayName.english: Turning off the lights in the morning

description.english: Cherish the earth. (6-7)
description.schinese: 爱护地球，节约用电。（6-7）
description.tchinese: 愛護地球，節約用電。（6-7）

description.english: Lovely is the greatest utility. (6-8)
description.schinese: 可爱就是最大的效用。（6-8）
description.tchinese: 可愛就是最大的效用。（6-8）

description.english: Why are you so close to me? (7-1)
description.schinese: 为什么离我这么近？（7-1）
description.tchinese: 為什麼離我這麼近？（7-1）

description.english: Optimism, Pessimism, and Me. (7-2)
My reality game. (7-3)
description.schinese: 我的桌面实况游戏。（7-3）
description.tchinese: 我的桌面實況遊戲。（7-3）

description.english: Let it be. (7-4)
description.schinese: 顺其自然。（7-4）
description.tchinese: 順其自然。（7-4）

description.english: Manual earthquake. (?)
description.schinese: 手动地震。（?）
description.tchinese: 手動地震。（?）

description.english: Name:  Luna (4) - Likes to scratch mosquitoes.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Luna (4岁) - 喜欢抓蚊子。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Luna (4歲) - 喜歡抓蚊子。

description.english: Name: Bella (2) - Likes to eat fish.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Bella (2岁) - 喜欢吃鱼。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Bella (2歲) - 喜歡吃魚。

description.english: Name: Oliver (3) - Likes to snooze.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Oliver (3岁) - 喜欢打盹。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Oliver (3歲) - 喜歡打盹。

description.english: Name: Max (5) - Likes to catch mice.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Max (5岁) - 喜欢抓老鼠。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Max (5歲) - 喜歡抓老鼠。

description.english: Name: Coco (1) - Likes to chase the light.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Coco (1岁) - 喜欢追光。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Coco (1歲) - 喜歡追光。

description.english: Name: Charlie (6) - Likes to catch cat hair balls.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Charlie (6岁) - 喜欢抓猫毛球。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Charlie (6歲) - 喜歡抓貓毛球。

description.english: Name:  Simba (3) - Likes to roll around.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Simba (3岁) - 喜欢打滚。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Simba (3歲) - 喜歡打滾。

description.english: Name: Leo (2) - Likes to play with balls of wool.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Leo (2岁) - 喜欢玩毛线球。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Leo (2歲) - 喜歡玩毛線球。

description.english: Name: Milo (4) - Likes to catch the fishing pole.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Milo (4岁) - 喜欢抓鱼竿。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Milo (4歲) - 喜歡抓魚竿。

description.english: Name: Jasper (5) - Likes to play with boxes.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Jasper (5岁) - 喜欢打盒子。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Jasper (5歲) - 喜歡打盒子。

description.english: Name: Tilly (1) - Likes to run around.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Tilly (1岁) - 喜欢跑来跑去。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Tilly (1歲) - 喜歡跑來跑去。

description.english: Name: Kiki (6) - Likes to sleep under people's feet.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Kiki (6岁) - 喜欢睡在人的脚下。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Kiki (6歲) - 喜歡睡在人的腳下。

description.english: Name: Cleo (3) - Likes to catch toy birds.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Cleo (3岁) - 喜欢抓玩具鸟。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Cleo (3歲) - 喜歡抓玩具鳥。

description.english: Name: Willow (2) - Likes to climb trees.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Willow (2岁) - 喜欢爬树。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Willow (2歲) - 喜歡爬樹。

description.english: Name: Whiskers (4) - Likes to catch ants.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Whiskers (4岁) - 喜欢抓蚂蚁。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Whiskers (4歲) - 喜歡抓螞蟻。

description.english: Name: Felix (5) - Likes to jump high.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Felix (5岁) - 喜欢跳高。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Felix (5歲) - 喜歡跳高。

description.english: Name: Pippa (6) - Likes to catch butterflies.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Pippa (6岁) - 喜欢抓蝴蝶。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Pippa (6歲) - 喜歡抓蝴蝶。

description.english: Name: Ginger (3) - Likes to hide in the cat box.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Ginger (3岁) - 喜欢躲猫笼。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Ginger (3歲) - 喜歡躲貓籠。

description.english: Name: Callie (2) - Likes to eat meat.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Callie (2岁) - 喜欢吃肉。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Callie (2歲) - 喜歡吃肉。

description.english: Name: Salem (4) - Likes to sing.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Salem (4岁) - 喜欢唱歌。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Salem (4歲) - 喜歡唱歌。

description.english: Name: Smudge (5) - Likes to play with water.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Smudge (5岁) - 喜欢玩水。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Smudge (5歲) - 喜歡玩水。

description.english: Name: Socks (6) - Likes to fight.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Socks (6岁) - 喜欢打架。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Socks (6歲) - 喜歡打架。

description.english: Name: Peanut (3) - Likes to watch fish.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Peanut (3岁) - 喜欢看鱼。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Peanut (3歲) - 喜歡看魚。

description.english: Name:  Teddy (2) - Likes to hide under the covers.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Teddy (2岁) - 喜欢躲在被窝里。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Teddy (2歲) - 喜歡躲在被窩裡。

description.english: Name: Cinnamon (4) - Likes to eat fish bones.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Cinnamon (4岁) - 喜欢吃鱼骨头。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Cinnamon (4歲) - 喜歡吃魚骨頭。

description.english: Name: Snowball (5) - Likes to roll around.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Snowball (5岁) - 喜欢打滚。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Snowball (5歲) - 喜歡打滾。

description.english: Name: Precious (6) - Likes to sleep on the windowsill.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Precious (6岁) - 喜欢睡在窗台上。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Precious (6歲) - 喜歡睡在窗臺上。

description.english: Name: Gizmo (3) - Likes to catch ants.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Gizmo (3岁) - 喜欢抓蚂蚁。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Gizmo (3歲) - 喜歡抓螞蟻。

description.english: Name: Chai (2) - Likes to play with the tow strap.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Chai (2岁) - 喜欢玩拖带。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Chai (2歲) - 喜歡玩拖帶。

description.english: Name: Shadow (4) - Likes to play with broom.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Shadow (4岁) - 喜欢玩扫帚。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Shadow (4歲) - 喜歡玩掃帚。

description.english: Name:  Muffin (5) - Likes to play with fruit leather.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Muffin (5岁) - 喜欢玩水果皮。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Muffin (5歲) - 喜歡玩水果皮。

description.english: Name: Puddles (6) - Likes to play with water.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Puddles (6岁) - 喜欢玩水。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Puddles (6歲) - 喜歡玩水。

description.english: Name: Fluffy (3) - Likes to play with plastic bags.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Fluffy (3岁) - 喜欢玩塑料袋。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Fluffy (3歲) - 喜歡玩塑膠袋。

description.english: Name: Misty (2) - Likes to play with brooms.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Misty (2岁) - 喜欢玩扫帚。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Misty (2歲) - 喜歡玩掃帚。

description.english: Name:  Mochi (4) - Likes to play with fingers.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Mochi (4岁) - 喜欢玩手指。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Mochi (4歲) - 喜歡玩手指。

description.english: Name:  Koda (5) - Likes to play with paper.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Koda (5岁) - 喜欢玩纸张。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Koda (5歲) - 喜歡玩紙張。

description.english: Name: Archie (6) - Likes to play with scented things.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Archie (6岁) - 喜欢玩带有香味的东西。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Archie (6歲) - 喜歡玩帶有香味的東西。

description.english: Name:  Mr. Purrfect (3) - Likes to play with coils.
description.schinese: 猫咪名：Mr. Purrfect (3岁) - 喜欢玩线圈。
description.tchinese: 貓咪名：Mr. Purrfect (3歲) - 喜歡玩線圈。

description.english: Oh my God! You've collected all the cat stickers!
description.schinese: 天啊！你收集齐全部猫咪贴纸了！
description.tchinese: 天啊！你收集齊全部貓咪貼紙了！

description.english: So close, but it's time to quit the game and go take a break.
description.schinese: 就差一点点，但也可以退出游戏去休息了。
description.tchinese: 就差一點點，但也可以退出遊戲去休息了。

description.english: 100%! Perfect! Now you can quit the game and take a break.
description.schinese: 100%！完美无瑕，可以退出游戏去休息了。
description.tchinese: 100%！完美無瑕，可以退出遊戲去休息了。
